meanings.definition: A Muslim who has made the pilgrimage to Mecca.
meanings.sent1: The hadjis gathered in Mecca for the pilgrimage.
meanings.sent2: Many hadjis travel to Mecca for the pilgrimage.
meanings.sent3: The hadjis joked about their long journey to Mecca.
meanings.sent4: In their hearts, the hadjis carried the spirit of Mecca.
meanings.sent5: The hadjis' pilgrimage to Mecca was a life-changing experience.

meanings.sent1: We met a group of hadjis on their way to Mecca.
meanings.sent2: The hadjis were excited to embark on their pilgrimage.
meanings.sent3: The hadjis' hats were all different colors.
meanings.sent4: The marketplace was bustling with the presence of hadjis.
meanings.sent5: The hadjis' camaraderie was evident as they journeyed together.
